description:
time: Allow Parse and Format to handle time zone offsets with seconds

Adds layout cases with seconds for stdISO8601 and stdNumTZ with and without colons. Update time.Format to append seconds for those cases.

Fixes issue 4934.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Please remind us of this CL after Go 1.1 is out.

-rob

R=r

Rob wanted to be reminded when Go 1.1 is out. It is now out, so this is ready for review.
This CL is good. Please sign the CLA as documented at the bottom of http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html

On 2013/07/31 03:46:13, r wrote:
> This CL is good. Please sign the CLA as documented at the bottom of
> http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html

Thanks. Submitted the CLA.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=40fbff3fa50a ***

time: Allow Parse and Format to handle time zone offsets with seconds

Adds layout cases with seconds for stdISO8601 and stdNumTZ with and without colons. Update time.Format to append seconds for those cases.

Fixes issue 4934.

R=golang-dev, r, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/8132044

Committer: Rob Pike <r@golang.org>
